name: Go to Bed
description:
WASD/Arrow Keys to move and mouse click on horns to find the little monsters and send them to bed!

A slightly refined version of our Godot Wild #17 jam submission, using the two day extension. The theme was "discovery". (The submission for the original deadline can be seen here.)

The browser version can be a little laggy and also displays some colours incorrectly (due to our inexperience with Godot!), so check out a desktop version to see it in its "true glory".

Music - Call to Adventure by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3470-call-to-adventure
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
